item.title: Need Much Help! - ansers please?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“i bucky i, post:5, topic:354636”]so like edit the files but dont compile? to anti leech??

and yes a client… i want to let other people come on the server now its ready
but i dont want people to be able to compile my client and its in the client folder[/quote]
Yes, you can do that for an anti-leech, or make a error in the code, so it does compile but throws an exception at runtime, or make a bug in the code so they can’t walk, or players don’t render, or some shit like that.

Oh and a client, you can obfuscate the code, but this is still reversible although who would take so much time and effort to do that…

yWorks, the diagramming company

yGuard

Free Java™ bytecode obfuscator and shrinker

Read full topic

item.title: Need Much Help! - ansers please?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Why would you send someone your source if you don’t want them to edit it? Unless you mean a client, do you mean a client?

And an anti-leech you just make a error, or some kind of bug or glitch within the code that they have to fix for them to use the server properly.

Read full topic

item.description:

i mean like making so when i send people the files they can edit, and compile and put all the files into one rar.bat file? so they cant use all my files? and i mean anti leech how do you adD>?

item.title: Need Much Help! - ansers please?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“i bucky i, post:1, topic:354636”]How To Leech Your Server So People cant steal
how you make all files into a client i.e Run.bat
how you change your home
how you make talking npc’s?
how you change what npcs are wearnig
how you move npcs…
thanks if you know anyone of theese answers add garybuckley2008@hotmail.com[/quote]
Your first two questions make no sense. Leeching a source means to take it, and/or host and release it with very minor, if any, changes.

A client is the program used to connect to your server, you don’t “make all files into a client”…

Read full topic
